text: Combine all the ingredients together, except the fruit salt in a bowl and mix well adding water as required (approximately ¾ cup) to make a thick batter.  Just before steaming, add the fruit salt and add two tablespoons of water over it.  When the bubbles form, mix gently.  Pour the batter immediately into a greased 125 mm. (5") diameter thali and shake the thali clockwise to spread the batter in an even layer. Steam for 12 to 15 minutes or till the dhoklas are cooked. Then, set the dhoklas aside. Heat the oil in a small pan and add the mustard seeds.  Wait for the seeds to crackle. Then, add the sesame seeds, green chillies and asafetida. Mix well and sauté on a medium flame for a second, while stirring continuously. Remove from the flame, add two tablespoons of water and mix well. Pour the tempering over the dhoklas. Cool slightly and cut into equal pieces. Serve immediately garnished with coriander.
